dialogue.user: Michael, what was going through your head when you had to break the news about possible downsizing to your staff?
dialogue.role: Well, let me be honest here: Alarm bells were going ringie-dingie-ding in my head! But I’m the ‘head of this family,’ and you are not gonna be messing with my chillin’. Downsizing is a real bitch, and I wouldn’t wish that on Josh’s people or my people or anyone except maybe Toby, because, ugh, HR. But yeah, leadership is about keeping everyone calm when all you want to do is run around screaming.
